an10.114:1.1: “Mendicants, you should know bad principles and good principles.
an10.114:1.2: And you should know bad results and good results.
an10.114:1.3: Knowing these things, your practice should follow the good principles with good results.
an10.114:2.1: So what are bad principles? What are good principles? What are bad results? And what are good results?
an10.114:3.1: Wrong view is a bad principle.
an10.114:3.2: Right view is a good principle.
an10.114:3.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong view are bad results.
an10.114:3.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right view are good results.
an10.114:4.1: Wrong thought is a bad principle.
an10.114:4.2: Right thought is a good principle.
an10.114:4.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong thought are bad results.
an10.114:4.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right thought are good results.
an10.114:5.1: Wrong speech is a bad principle.
an10.114:5.2: Right speech is a good principle.
an10.114:5.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong speech are bad results.
an10.114:5.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right speech are good results.
an10.114:6.1: Wrong action is a bad principle.
an10.114:6.2: Right action is a good principle.
an10.114:6.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong action are bad results.
an10.114:6.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right action are good results.
an10.114:7.1: Wrong livelihood is a bad principle.
an10.114:7.2: Right livelihood is a good principle.
an10.114:7.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong livelihood are bad results.
an10.114:7.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right livelihood are good results.
an10.114:8.1: Wrong effort is a bad principle.
an10.114:8.2: Right effort is a good principle.
an10.114:8.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong effort are bad results.
an10.114:8.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right effort are good results.
an10.114:9.1: Wrong mindfulness is a bad principle.
an10.114:9.2: Right mindfulness is a good principle.
an10.114:9.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong mindfulness are bad results.
an10.114:9.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right mindfulness are good results.
an10.114:10.1: Wrong immersion is a bad principle.
an10.114:10.2: Right immersion is a good principle.
an10.114:10.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong immersion are bad results.
an10.114:10.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right immersion are good results.
an10.114:11.1: Wrong knowledge is a bad principle.
an10.114:11.2: Right knowledge is a good principle.
an10.114:11.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong knowledge are bad results.
an10.114:11.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right knowledge are good results.
an10.114:12.1: Wrong freedom is a bad principle.
an10.114:12.2: Right freedom is a good principle.
an10.114:12.3: And the many bad, unskillful qualities produced by wrong freedom are bad results.
an10.114:12.4: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right freedom are good results.
an10.114:13.1: ‘You should know bad principles and good principles.
an10.114:13.2: And you should know bad results and good results.
an10.114:13.3: Knowing these things, your practice should follow the good principles with good results.’
an10.114:13.4: That’s what I said, and this is why I said it.”
